actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act and the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 in order to prohibit the withholding for income tax purposes under the laws of any State or subdivision thereof of certain compensation of employees whose residence is in a State which does not levy a tax on the income of individuals.

summary.text: Amends the Interstate Commerce Act and the Federal Aviation Act to prohibit the withholding for income tax purposes by a State or subdivision thereof of compensation of common carrier employees whose residence is in a State which does not levy a State income tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act and the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 in order to prohibit the withholding for income tax purposes under the laws of any State or subdivision thereof of certain compensation of employees whose residence is in a State which does not levy a tax on the income of individuals.
